named-native-query.name: infoVendedores.recuperarVendedorValor
named-native-query.query: SELECT d.FUNCOD cdFuncionario , f.FUNDES nmFuncionario , SUM(d.DOCVLRTOT) vlTotal FROM FUNCIONARIO f, DOCUMENTO d WHERE d.FUNCOD = f.FUNCOD AND d.DOCSTA = 'E' AND d.ORICOD IN (:tipo) AND d.OPECOD IN (:operacao) AND d.DOCDATEMI BETWEEN :dataInicial AND :dataFinal GROUP BY d.FUNCOD, f.FUNDES ORDER BY vlTotal DESC

named-native-query.name: infoVendedores.recuperarVendedorQuantidade
named-native-query.query: SELECT d.FUNCOD cdFuncionario , f.FUNDES nmFuncionario , SUM(s.ITSQTDTOT) qtProduto , AVG(s.ITSVLRLIQ) vlMedia FROM ITEM_SAIDA s, FUNCIONARIO f, DOCUMENTO d WHERE d.FUNCOD = f.FUNCOD AND s.FUNCOD = d.FUNCOD AND s.SAICOD = d.DOCCOD AND d.DOCSTA = 'E' AND d.ORICOD IN (:tipo) AND d.OPECOD IN (:operacao) AND d.DOCDATEMI BETWEEN :dataInicial AND :dataFinal GROUP BY d.FUNCOD, f.FUNDES ORDER BY qtProduto DESC

named-native-query.name: infoVendedores.recuperarVendedorTroca
named-native-query.query: SELECT d.FUNCOD cdFuncionario , f.FUNDES nmFuncionario , SUM(d.DOCVLRTOT) vlTotal FROM FUNCIONARIO f, DOCUMENTO d WHERE d.FUNCOD = f.FUNCOD AND d.DOCSTA = 'E' AND d.DOCSTANFE = 'A' AND d.ORICOD IN (:tipo) AND d.OPECOD IN (:operacao) AND d.DOCDATEMI BETWEEN :dataInicial AND :dataFinal GROUP BY d.FUNCOD, f.FUNDES ORDER BY vlTotal DESC
